text: Kanye West is rumored to be nearing billionaire status. The rapper and entrepreneur has been married to Kim Kardashian since 2014. The celebrity ’ s business ventures include his successful Yeezy collection. Kanye West delivered on what he promised this year. After a controversial few weeks due to comments about President Donald Trump and slavery, he returned to music in a big way. The rapper released his album, “ Ye, ” on June 1, 2018, which was his first album release since 2016. The abum features other big names like Nicki Minaj. West also released an album, “ Kids See Ghosts, ” with Kid Cudi on June 8.
